name: Proof_343 — Manual Weeding Around Chili Plants MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a manual weeding activity performed at MaMeeFarm, recorded on 16 December 2025 at 02:52 PM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee actively clearing grass and weeds around chili plants using a hand tool. The work is conducted under natural daylight conditions, with banana trees and mixed vegetation surrounding the growing area.

This activity represents continued farm labor following earlier irrigation and rest periods. Weed removal is a routine but essential task that reduces competition for water and nutrients, supports plant health, and maintains usable growing space in small-scale farming environments.

The task is performed manually, without mechanized equipment or chemical herbicides, reflecting real-world constraints and direct human labor input.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth documentation, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The timestamp embedded in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and maintains continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily operational proof archive.

This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
